sql.value: SELECT PAGE_ID, PAGE_URL_ADR, PAGE_DSC, HELP_PAGE_URL_ADR,PROG_PCT FROM ~SCHEMA~PAGE
SELECT TXT_ID, CMT_TXT, TXT_DSC, LANG_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~DPLY_TXT ORDER BY TXT_ID
SELECT TXT_ID, HIST_FLG, MSG_TYP, VFCN_RSN_CD, DEPT_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~BNFT_MSG ORDER BY TXT_ID
SELECT MSG_ID, SVR_CD, MSG_DSC,LANG_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~MSG ORDER BY MSG_ID
SELECT RSN_CD, CAT_CD, ACTN_IND, SUB_RSN_CD FROM ~SCHEMA~DUP_RSN_SPRS ORDER BY RSN_CD

SELECT ABAPD_STAT_IND, ABBNR_STAT_IND, ABDCD_STAT_IND, ABEDT_STAT_IND, ABEFD_STAT_IND, ABESM_STAT_IND, ABFAS_STAT_IND, ABHEQ_STAT_IND, ABHES_STAT_IND, ABHHQ_STAT_IND, ABHHR_STAT_IND, ABHIS_STAT_IND, ABHMD_STAT_IND, ABHMS_STAT_IND, ABJIQ_STAT_IND, ABJIS_STAT_IND, ABMED_STAT_IND, ABNSD_STAT_IND, ABNSO_STAT_IND, ABOEQ_STAT_IND, ABOIQ_STAT_IND, ABOIS_STAT_IND, ABPAS_STAT_IND, ABPPS_STAT_IND, ABPRG_STAT_IND, ABPRI_STAT_IND, ABPSQ_STAT_IND, ABRGI_STAT_IND, ABRGS_STAT_IND, ABRLV_STAT_IND, ABSCD_STAT_IND, ABSCT_STAT_IND, ABSED_STAT_IND, ABSEN_STAT_IND, ABUCD_STAT_IND, ABUCT_STAT_IND, ABUID_STAT_IND, ABUIT_STAT_IND, ABBAD_STAT_IND, ABBAT_STAT_IND, ABCON_STAT_IND, ABDIS_STAT_IND, ABHCA_STAT_IND, ABHCD_STAT_IND, ABHWA_STAT_IND, ABIND_STAT_IND, ABLAD_STAT_IND, ABLAQ_STAT_IND, ABLAS_STAT_IND, ABLAT_STAT_IND, ABLID_STAT_IND, ABLIT_STAT_IND, ABOAQ_STAT_IND, ABOAS_STAT_IND, ABPPD_STAT_IND, ABRPD_STAT_IND, ABRPT_STAT_IND, ABVAD_STAT_IND, ABVAT_STAT_IND, ABPCD_STAT_IND, ABPED_STAT_IND, ABAPA_STAT_IND, ABPLR_STAT_IND,ABTFS_STAT_IND,ABTFD_STAT_IND,ABEFS_STAT_IND,ABEAD_STAT_IND,ABTDS_STAT_IND,ABTDD_STAT_IND,ABTCD_STAT_IND,ABTDH_STAT_IND,ABTIN_STAT_IND,ABHCQ_STAT_IND,ABHAG_STAT_IND,ABHAD_STAT_IND,ABHCS_STAT_IND,ABYIN_STAT_IND,ABCIR_STAT_IND,ABHAG_STAT_IND,ABHAD_STAT_IND,ABEEI_STAT_IND,ABBDC_STAT_IND,ABRTE_STAT_IND,ABAPT_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~AFB_DRVR WHERE APP_NUM = ?

SELECT ARACD_STAT_IND, ARCAT_STAT_IND, ARHAP_STAT_IND, ARHCS_STAT_IND, ARHDD_STAT_IND, ARHDE_STAT_IND, ARHIS_STAT_IND, ARHMA_STAT_IND, ARHMD_STAT_IND, ARHMI_STAT_IND, ARHMO_STAT_IND, ARHPD_STAT_IND, ARHPG_STAT_IND, ARHRL_STAT_IND, ARHSE_STAT_IND, ARJID_STAT_IND, ARJIS_STAT_IND, ARJSD_STAT_IND, ARJSE_STAT_IND, ARPRS_STAT_IND, ARTKY_STAT_IND, ARUID_STAT_IND, ARUII_STAT_IND, ARUIS_STAT_IND, ARUIT_STAT_IND, ARXHD_STAT_IND, ARXHI_STAT_IND, ARXHS_STAT_IND, ARXHU_STAT_IND, ARXUD_STAT_IND, HSCSO_STAT_IND, HSHER_STAT_IND, HSHMO_STAT_IND, ARACS_STAT_IND, ARAGQ_STAT_IND, ARAIQ_STAT_IND, ARASM_STAT_IND, ARBAD_STAT_IND, ARBAT_STAT_IND, ARDCD_STAT_IND, ARDFD_STAT_IND, ARFAS_STAT_IND, ARHCD_STAT_IND, ARHOD_STAT_IND, ARIWE_STAT_IND, ARJGQ_STAT_IND, ARLAD_STAT_IND, ARLAT_STAT_IND, ARLID_STAT_IND, ARLIT_STAT_IND, ARMAP_STAT_IND, ARMBD_STAT_IND, AROBC_STAT_IND, AROBI_STAT_IND, AROBQ_STAT_IND, AROBS_STAT_IND, AROIQ_STAT_IND, ARPCS_STAT_IND, ARPGQ_STAT_IND, ARPIQ_STAT_IND, ARPPD_STAT_IND, ARRBE_STAT_IND, ARRPD_STAT_IND, ARRPT_STAT_IND, ARSOD_STAT_IND, ARVAD_STAT_IND, ARVAT_STAT_IND, ARXGQ_STAT_IND, ARXIQ_STAT_IND, ARRBI_STAT_IND, ARAPA_STAT_IND, ARPLR_STAT_IND, ARHCA_STAT_IND, ARPCD_STAT_IND, ARPER_STAT_IND, ARCGQ_STAT_IND, ARCCC_STAT_IND, ARAUD_STAT_IND, ARSPD_STAT_IND, ARAAD_STAT_IND, ARCCS_STAT_IND, AREAD_STAT_IND,AREFS_STAT_IND,ARTCD_STAT_IND,ARTDD_STAT_IND,ARTDH_STAT_IND,ARTDS_STAT_IND,ARTFD_STAT_IND,ARTFS_STAT_IND,ARCTQ_STAT_IND, ARIPR_STAT_IND, ARHCQ_STAT_IND, ARALD_STAT_IND, ARFPS_STAT_IND, ARSUB_STAT_IND, ARBCR_STAT_IND, ARDCI_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~RMC_DRVR WHERE APP_NUM = ?
SELECT APPWR_STAT_IND, APWCI_STAT_IND, APWCS_STAT_IND, APWID_STAT_IND, APWII_STAT_IND, APWPS_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~PE_PREG_WMN_DRVR WHERE APP_NUM = ?
SELECT APCCI_STAT_IND, APCCS_STAT_IND, APCHR_STAT_IND, APCID_STAT_IND, APCII_STAT_IND, APCPS_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~PE_CHLD_DRVR WHERE APP_NUM = ?
SELECT ANFAS_STAT_IND, ANHNQ_STAT_IND, ANIHD_STAT_IND, ANOTH_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~NEHNA_APP_DRVR WHERE APP_NUM = ?
SELECT AHAHQ_STAT_IND, AHCSC_STAT_IND, AHIHD_STAT_IND, AHPSC_STAT_IND, AHSMP_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~HNA_DRVR WHERE HC_ENRL_NUM = ?
SELECT ADPOD_STAT_IND, ADSCN_STAT_IND, ADSUM_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~DOC_DRVR WHERE BAT_NUM = ?
SELECT ADLND_STAT_IND, AXBCB_STAT_IND, AXFEE_STAT_IND, AXHMO_STAT_IND, AXHNA_STAT_IND, AXNAH_STAT_IND FROM ~SCHEMA~NEXT_STEPS_DRVR WHERE NEXT_STEPS_TRK_NUM = ?
SELECT * FROM ~SCHEMA~ACS_MBL_USR_D_TK WHERE DVC_TKN_ID = ? AND TKN_IND = 'Y' AND WAMS_LOGN_ID <> ?
